summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3882 for the improvement of North 39th Street, from Woodland Park Avenue to Fremont Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 47405, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
